backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types and structures for songs, podcasts, profiles, verification, blog posts, and community messages, importing multiple modules and exposing the migration hook.
backend/migration.mo: Defines data structures for old and new actor states and handles migration logic for submissions, profiles, podcasts, and configuration data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated file paths, components, test IDs, and confidence for feature verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their functionality across UI, forms, hooks, and dashboards.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents deployment issues, fixes, and verification steps related to missing config and actor initialization behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React app routing, auth checks, and conditional rendering of dashboards and setup flows based on user state.
frontend/src/components/AdminAnnouncemen: Provides UI for admins to view, edit, and save a global announcement message.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Displays searchable artist list with badge status and supports opening an edit dialog for each artist.
frontend/src/components/AdminBlogManagem: Handles creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blog posts with optional media uploads.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Dialog for admins to edit an artistâ€™s profile, including updating photos and social links.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditSubmiss: Dialog allowing admins to edit song submissions, update metadata, and replace artwork or audio files.
frontend/src/components/AdminFeeManageme: UI for viewing and updating distribution and annual maintenance fees, with form inputs and save actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminPodcastSubm: Lists all podcast shows and episodes with artwork, metadata, and file download handling for admins.
frontend/src/components/AdminProfileEdit: Admin toggle to enable or disable artist profile editing, showing current status and related rules.
frontend/src/components/AdminStats.tsx: Fetches submission data and displays summary statistics for total, approved, pending, and rejected items.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin interface for reviewing, updating, commenting on, downloading assets from, and managing song submissions.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Manages team invite codes, allowing generation, viewing unused codes, and copying invite links.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserRoleMan: Manages user roles with search, upgrade/downgrade actions, and user deletion UI using team member and artist data.
frontend/src/components/AdminVerificatio: Displays and updates verification requests, including status changes and expiry-day adjustments for each request.
Empty placeholder component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementPopu: Shows a popup announcement fetched from the backend, only once per session, with dismiss handling.
Form for creating or editing an artist profile with photo upload, social links, and editing restrictions.
frontend/src/components/DashboardPublish: Fetches and displays a list of published blog posts with media, dates, and content previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer showing copyright text and a support email link.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Renders a green badge image with tooltip, customizable by size.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main header with login/logout, navigation, theme toggle, and user display info with badges.
frontend/src/components/PodcastEpisodeFo: Form component for creating podcast episodes with file uploads, validation, and progress tracking.
Form for creating podcast shows, handling artwork upload, metadata fields, and submission via API.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their display name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/SongSubmissionFo: Comprehensive form for uploading a song with metadata, artwork and audio files, fee agreement, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigurat: Empty file placeholder for a Stripe configuration modal.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSect: Empty file placeholder for a subscription UI section.
frontend/src/components/UserEditSubmissi: Dialog allowing users to edit an existing song submission, including replacing artwork or audio and updating metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserPodcastSubmi: Section managing podcast shows and episodes, allowing creation of shows and adding episodes with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Displays the user's song submissions with status badges and edit options, fetching data via hooks. Handles loading, empty states, and opens an edit dialog for editable submissions.
frontend/src/components/VerificationBene: Shows a one-time popup highlighting verification benefits to unverified users, with navigation to the verification subscription page.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadge.ts: Renders a verified artist badge image with a tooltip, supporting multiple sizes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for song submissions, profiles, and other backend interactions, with mutation success/error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders a multi-tab admin dashboard with sections for stats, submissions, artists, verification, roles, fees, announcements, blog, team, and podcasts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Fetches and displays published blog posts with media, dates, and content, showing a loader or empty state when needed.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with branding, a login button, and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboard.tsx: Provides a limited-access team dashboard with tabs for overview, submissions, and artist viewing, plus permission info.
frontend/src/pages/ThankYouPage.tsx: Shows a confirmation card after submission with a button returning to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard with tabs for submissions, profile, verification, blogs, and podcasts, integrating profile state and verification workflows.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationSubscript: React page that displays verification status, pricing, and benefits, and lets users apply for verification via query hooks.
Utility to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File or Blob into an ExternalBlob and optionally attaches upload progress handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing podcast workflow features, requirements, and pending feature requests.
